fact_list.fact_text: Fort Canning Tunnel (FCT) and Woodsville Tunnel (WVT) - head for the tunnel entrance or exit, whichever is safer.
CTE - head for the escape staircase and cross passage doors within tunnels with walls painted with red and white stripes.
KPE/MCE - head for the white escape doors with green walls within tunnels.
If you are approaching the tunnel, do not enter the tunnel.
Look out for the messages displayed on the Variable Message Signboards.
Use an alternative road to reach your destination.
